file_content.text: [These records consist of appointment calendars, logs of financial transactions, meeting transcripts and personal notes from Denri Ayl's time as a mediator.]
[Much of the information is meaningless without context, but a few journal entries catch your attention:]
[Entry 56: Met with representative of Mindak family (Dromund Kaas). Agreed to purchases. Credits to be transferred tomorrow.
[Entry 62: Negotiations successful. As goodwill gesture, House Organa and House Renar agree to fifty thousand credits in charitable donations.]
[Both houses concur: I will act as unbiased party in choosing charity. Will announce decision of Broken Valley Relief Fund (Balmorra) tomorrow.]
[Entry 86: At C's suggestion, canceled next week's summit with Thul.]
[Entry 87: Attack on DK; Darth Jadus assassinated. Bigger than expected; glad summit was canceled. (Arrange charitable gifts in response to tragedy?)]
[Entry 96: At tonight's gala, meet with EE to arrange future visit. Ask about privacy concerns (C suggests secrecy).]
